app_metadata.description: Jellyfin is a Free Software Media System that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media.
app_metadata.name: jellyfin

run_as_context.description: Jellyfin runs as any non-root user.

attrs.description: The user id that Jellyfin files will be owned by.

attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.
Temporary: Is a temporary directory that will be created on the disk as a docker volume.
tmpfs: Is a temporary directory that will be created on the RAM.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
Temporary (Temporary directory created on the disk)
tmpfs (Temporary directory created on the RAM)

attrs.label: tmpfs Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the tmpfs dataset.

attrs.label: Tmpfs Size Limit (in Mi)
attrs.description:
The maximum size (in Mi) of the temporary directory.</br>
For example: 500

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

1.0.17.readme:
Jellyfin

Jellyfin is a Free Software Media System that puts you in control of managing and streaming your media.
